item.description: 2007 FREE Summer Concert Series every Wednesday (6:30 - 8:00 PM) on the Rose Garden Lawn. >>> IF RAIN: concert will be moved INSIDE the "Pond House" <<< Find me/us under 3 shiny BLUE Star-shaped Balloons; likely playing Bocce. >>> July 11 ~ Abbey Road: Tribute to the Beatles. *** <<< FYI: July 18 ~ Pawn Brokers Blues (New Orleans Blues) *** July 25 ~ River City Slim & the Zydeco Hogs. *** Aug 1 ~ Deanna Mitchell & Due West (Today's country) + Aug 8 ~ The Floyd Patterson Band (Top 40, R&B, Rock) + Aug 15 ~ Pandemonium with Teresa Rodriguez (50's music) + Aug 22 ~ Sophisticats String Band (Jazz standard, swing & folk) +++ Aug 29 ~ MassConn Fusion (Rock, R&B, Motown) *** http://www.elizabethpark.org/

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: BEATLES tribute: "Abbey Road" 6:30-8:00
